page.title: 05BILLERICAY NW Industry 1.
page.content: {Industrial Estate There is one small industrial estate in this area. The industrial estate is in the centre of Billericay,(close to the railway station) in the SE of the area we are covering. These small factory units use modern machinery and make little {pollution.}They have all been built in the last 20 years and one is still being completed. They all have their own private{car parks, these are mostly used by private cars with a few transport lorries. All these factory units are situated along three roads. The people who work here all live locally. One or two firms have taken over 2 or 3 units. There are 35 units altogether.{
